name: Siddhalepa Supirivicky Toothpaste
description: Supirivicky is made from herbal ingredients known for their healing and restorative effects on gums, teeth, throat and tongue. Supirivicky helps to control tooth decay, and the discolouration of teeth. It also reduces the formation of tartar. No artificial sweeteners, fluoride, dyes or chemical preservatives are used in the manufacture of this toothpaste.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
